extendedInfo.description: The free Ames Pocket Library app is a quick and convenient way to connect to Ames Public Library. Search for books, movies, and more from your mobile device. Youâll be amazed how easy it is to renew your items, check your account, look up the Libraryâs hours and locations, and find upcoming events! Download e-books and audiobooks right from the Library. You can even scan any book to see if the Library owns it. Download now and experience your Library in a smart new way!

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: This has all the information I need for the library. With a couple other installs, I can even check out eBooks and audio books through the app. Renewing books is a snap, although it doesn\'t yet take the books from my house and return them to the library for me. Thanks for this handy app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy app
reviews.comment: Great app! Easy to use and the interface is intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the wait
reviews.comment: This was much needed!  The app has all the features that I use on the library website, such as searching the catalog and accessing my account, all on my smartphone.  Very convenient!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Here at last. APL mission statement \"Connecting you to the world of ideas\" just got richer.  We hope this app enriches your library experience.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So fun & convenient!
reviews.comment: I was at a store the other day & my daughter wanted to get a book she had found. I scanned the ISBN & found it at the library! So great!
reviews.author: A Google User
